Fadel Megahed

## Recall: Preliminary RAG Documents

```{python rag_docs_svg}
#| include: false
#| eval: false

# Generates the SVG with tooltips and immediately embeds it as HTML (<object>)
import graphviz
from IPython.display import HTML

dot = graphviz.Digraph(format='svg')
dot.attr(rankdir='LR',
         size='16,9!',        # lock to 16:9 for Reveal.js
         ratio='compress',
         pad='0.2',
         nodesep='0.4',
         ranksep='0.6',
         bgcolor='white',
         dpi='96')

title_node  = dict(shape='box',   style='filled', color='lightblue',  fontname='Helvetica')
folder_node = dict(shape='folder',style='filled', color='lightyellow',fontname='Helvetica')
common_node = dict(shape='note',  color='lightgrey',                  fontname='Helvetica')

# Main + categories
dot.node('KB', 'Chatbot Knowledge Base',
         tooltip="All reference documents used in the chatbot's RAG system.", **title_node)
dot.node('OSHA', 'OSHA Regulations (29 CFR 1910)',
         tooltip="Federal workplace safety standards under 29 CFR 1910.", **folder_node)
dot.node('NIOSH', 'NIOSH Publications',
         tooltip="NIOSH research and safety guidance documents.", **folder_node)
dot.node('Guides', 'OSHA Guides / Technical Manuals',
         tooltip="Supplementary OSHA guides and manuals for specific hazards.", **folder_node)
dot.edge('KB','OSHA'); dot.edge('KB','NIOSH'); dot.edge('KB','Guides')

# OSHA regs
osha_regs = [
    ("1910.147", "Lockout/Tagout [¬ß1910.147]", "Requirements for controlling hazardous energy during servicing and maintenance."),
    ("1910.178", "Powered Industrial Trucks [¬ß1910.178]", "Safety standards for forklifts and powered trucks."),
    ("1910.211", "Definitions ‚Äì Machine Guarding [¬ß1910.211]", "Key definitions used in OSHA‚Äôs machine guarding rules."),
    ("1910.212", "General Requirements for All Machines [¬ß1910.212]", "General machine guarding rules to protect operators and others."),
    ("1910.213", "Woodworking Machinery [¬ß1910.213]", "Guarding and operational requirements for woodworking machines."),
    ("1910.215", "Abrasive Wheel Machinery [¬ß1910.215]", "Safety specs for abrasive wheel machinery, including guards and work rests."),
    ("1910.217", "Mechanical Power Presses [¬ß1910.217]", "Safety requirements for mechanical power press operation and maintenance."),
    ("1910.218", "Forging Machines [¬ß1910.218]", "Safety practices and guarding for forging machinery."),
    ("1910.219", "Mechanical Power Transmission Apparatus [¬ß1910.219]", "Guarding requirements for belts, pulleys, gears, and other transmission parts.")
]
for code, title, tip in osha_regs:
    dot.node(code, title, tooltip=tip, **common_node)
    dot.edge('OSHA', code)

# NIOSH
niosh_docs = [
    ("2011-156", "Using Lockout/Tagout to Prevent Injury (2011-156)", "Guidance on implementing LOTO programs to protect workers."),
    ("85-103", "Preventing Injury of Workers by Robots (85-103)", "Safety strategies for preventing robot-related injuries.")
]
for code, title, tip in niosh_docs:
    dot.node(code, title, tooltip=tip, **common_node)
    dot.edge('NIOSH', code)

# Guides
guides_docs = [
    ("OTM", "OSHA Technical Manual ‚Äì IV: Industrial Robots", "Technical guidance on hazards, safeguarding, and risk assessments for industrial robots."),
    ("OSHA3120", "Lockout/Tagout: Control of Hazardous Energy (OSHA 3120)", "OSHA handbook outlining lockout/tagout procedures."),
    ("OSHA3170", "Safeguarding Equipment & Preventing Amputations (OSHA 3170)", "OSHA guide to machine guarding methods to prevent injuries.")
]
for code, title, tip in guides_docs:
    dot.node(code, title, tooltip=tip, **common_node)
    dot.edge('Guides', code)

# Save SVG
svg_path = "../../figs/chatbot_kb_flowchart_16x9_tooltips_revised"
dot.render(svg_path, cleanup=True, format='svg')
```
